question:
[Dana] and her son, [Kenneth], went to the park to fly a kite. They had fun doing it all day. [William] bought a steak dinner for himself and his brother [Larry]. [Judy] and her sister [Janice] were building a sand castle. [Larry], [Judy]'s brother, came by and kicked it, and the girls cried. [Beverly] and her aunt, [Michele], went to the deli. They got a half a pound of corned beef, and two pounds of salami. [Ethel] took her brother [William] and other brother [Kenneth] with her to eat pasta at a pasta buffet. [Janice] took her husband, [William], to have dinner with his daughter, [Beverly].
Question: How is [Michele] related to [Dana]?
